name: Edit tasks in table
description:
Edit the fields that we see, so we don't need to break out into a new view for it
I'm having trouble picturing what this would look like.
I mostly just want to update the status.
resolution:
I don't want more than one way to do things. This project should stay simple.
The task view should be the best way to update a task. Period.
Getting back to the task list is also easy.

Editing in the task list directly raises a concerns about data integrity, multiple touch points, accidental changes without hitting save, lack of full information and desire for it.
